horror_movies.title: The Exorcist
horror_movies.description: A young girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, leading her mother to seek the help of two priests to save her.

horror_movies.title: The Shining
horror_movies.description: A man takes his family to a remote hotel for the winter, but the isolation brings out dark and sinister forces in him.

horror_movies.title: Psycho
horror_movies.description: A secretary embezzles money and ends up at a secluded motel run by a mysterious man and his mother.

horror_movies.title: Hereditary
horror_movies.description: A family is haunted after the death of their secretive grandmother, uncovering horrifying truths about their ancestry.

horror_movies.title: It Follows
horror_movies.description: After a sexual encounter, a young woman is stalked by a supernatural force that follows her relentlessly.

horror_movies.title: Get Out
horror_movies.description: A Black man visits his white girlfriend's family, where he uncovers disturbing secrets about their intentions.

horror_movies.title: A Nightmare on Elm Street
horror_movies.description: A group of teenagers are stalked and killed in their dreams by a burned man with a clawed glove, Freddy Krueger.

horror_movies.title: The Conjuring
horror_movies.description: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family plagued by disturbing events in their farmhouse.

horror_movies.title: The Babadook
horror_movies.description: A mother and her son are haunted by a sinister presence that emerges from a mysterious book.

horror_movies.title: Midsommar
horror_movies.description: A group of friends travel to Sweden for a festival, but soon discover that the locals have disturbing traditions.
